page.title: 12Home life.
page.content: The following describes a typical day in the life of a family in our area. The family is made up of a tenant farmer his wife and three sons aged 16 13 and 8years.They farm sheep,store cattle and potatoes. 7a.m.Alarm wakes farmers wife farmer goes out to feed stock which are kept inside and ceck stock in the fields. Farmers wife wakes two older sons. 7.20a.m.Breakfast cereals and toast. 7.45a.m. middle son out to school,youngest son woken up. 8.00a.m.Oldest son starts work with his father,youngest son given his breakfast.Feed cats and dog.Sweep outside back door. 8.20a.m.repair youngest sons coat. 8.30a.m.take youngest son and his friend for school bus. 9.30a.m.clear table,load washer,sweep paths alongside house,make beds.
